thread.title: Marie
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Marie

author: Marie
title: Marie
text: The customer service was great! We had a shipping issue and I was called by a nice employee and we worked everything out. So very friendly and on top of things. Really, really, great customer service. My brother received the cupcakes and he sent me a picture. The picture showed some of the birthday circles were broken. Maybe this was rough handling from the delivery company or maybe there is a better way to package the cupcakes. Either way, great company and great service.
